about_the_game:
The 7th Sign Project is an episodic, extremely difficult 2D platform shooter with an enormous number of crazy weaponry and stunning aesthetics!

So, if you're itching to tackle a slew of exciting bosses like those in Contra 4,

or you're missing the excitement of burning the globe on fire to find key-cards in games like Doom,

or you want to blast your way through the stages and demolish everything in between using awesome firearms;

or even if you're simply a retro-gaming Metalhead;

This is the game for you, be prepared for an unexpected shock!

short_description: The 7th Sign Project is a classic 2D-platformer action game inspired by Doom, Quake, Abuse, and Painkiller games. Our goal is to entertain the player with massive enemy fights, boss fights, and stirring music.
